pages.title: Ritual Note
pages.text: Craft yourself a Crystal ritual note using the provided recipe. This will explain how to properly setup and preform a $(d)Crystal Ritual$().

pages.title: Preforming Rituals
pages.text: Please note that all candles in a ritual must be lit. Different colored candles can be used in place of any basic soy candle. Right click the center candle of the ritual to empower your emerald.
